oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hall. James and Margaret Hall, Chestnut Hunting, Oct. 1894.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: James S. Hall, Margaret Hall, and Dilla (Della?) Hill with horse (Charles Napoleon Bonaparte Nebuchudeneezer Bones Hall (sic.)), 'Chestnut Hunting.' Oct. 1894. Shows young bow holding horse's bridle, two young women on ground with food and bucket. From Hall and Stakely family pictures.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Picnics; Chestnuts; Horses; Social life;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
